skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

effects.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Its forehead adorned with a spiral horn, this noble mount carries the Damsel where their magical gifts are needed most.

effects.description: Mount: Unicorn

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Acolytes too are blessed by the Lady's spirit, enabling them to resist magical attacks.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Aura of the Lady"

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Blessed by the lady herself, the Grail Damsel shields the faithful from harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The enemy's missiles and spells shed some of their momentum at the Damsel's behest.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 3%
Missile resistance: 2%
Spell resistance: 6%
Missile resistance: 4%
Spell resistance: 10%
Missile resistance: 8%

skillTree.localised_description: The Damsel's prayers empower her with the glory and faith of the Lady of the Lake.

effects.description: Hit points: +3%
Leadership: +2
Hit points: +6%
Leadership: +4
Hit points: +10%
Leadership: +6

skillTree.localised_description: The enemy's blows are magically deflected, giving the Damsel more time to focus on her magic.

effects.description: Cooldown: -2% to all spells
Melee defence: +2
Cooldown: -4% to all spells
Melee defence: +4
Cooldown: -6% to all spells
Melee defence: +6

skillTree.localised_description: Casting aside spoiled tokens of virtue and nobility, the Damsel beseeches the Lady to hinder the enemy's weapons.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: -2
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_name: A Soft Spot for the Small Folk
skillTree.localised_description: The affection of somebody so righteous and powerful is rare to the small folk of Bretonnia; the Damsel's very presence steels their resolve.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 1% for all Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 3% for all Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

Physical resistance: 5% for all Peasant units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The peasants know of the Damsel's beauty, but once the men-at-arms behold her in person, they fight with the bravery of a knight to please her.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10%
	(when not embedded)
Speed: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Practiced in the art of casting; always with a spell at the ready.

effects.description: Cooldown: -2% to all spells
Cooldown: -4% to all spells
Cooldown: -8% to all spells

skillTree.localised_description: Your life is balanced on the edge of a knife when drawing from the winds. Too swift, and the winds will claim your life. Too slow, and the enemy will.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -1%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -2%
	(own characters in region)

Miscast base chance: -4%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: He who casts the first spell draws first blood.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: -2 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -4 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

Winds of Magic power reserve: -6 per turn
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: With the right amount of preparation, everything can harnessed to empower even the soldier’s mundane weapons.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +2% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

Weapon strength: +3% when attacking
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So great is this one’s raw power that the winds gust in unison.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +2 per turn
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description:
Corruption: -1
	(local province)
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2

Corruption: -2
	(local province)
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 4

Corruption: -3
	(local province)
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 6

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
